circumstances: While in cruising altitude along Annette Island, both engines failed simultaneously. Unable to divert to the nearest airport, the pilot reduced his altitude and ditched the aircraft off the island. The airplane slid for several yards and came to rest. All 11 occupants were quickly rescued while the aircraft was lost.
probable_cause: Failure of both engines in flight due to fuel exhaustion. Improper in-flight decisions or planning on part of the pilot who miscalculated the fuel consumption.
